titleStmt.title: A right fruitfull admonition concerning the order of a good Christian mans life very profitable for all maner of estates, and other to beholde and looke vppon / made by the famouse doctour Collet, sometime deane of Paules.
titleStmt.author: Colet, John, 1467?-1519.

notesStmt.note: Running title: The order of a good Christian mans life.
Reproduction of original in the Magdalene College (University of Cambridge). Library.
